name: Equilibrium (itch) (ParticleKing)
description:
This is my first project uploaded on itch as an individual. It took me around a week to make, but I just wanted to put something up here to start my journey.

 Equilibrium is a fast-paced puzzle game where you have to collect the collectible as many times as you can within a minute. 

I hope everyone enjoys my first itch upload :)
